room_title: Escape room "Billy the Kid" by Cluenundrum in Las Cruces
room_address: 580 S Valley Dr. Ste. 100, Las Cruces, NM 88005
room_description:
As one of the most notorious historical figures in the southwest, Billy the Kid has deep ties to Mesilla. It is here that he was tried and convicted for the murder of Sheriff William J. Brady. It is also the one jail he did not escape from.
It all starts when you are arrested by the New Mexico Territorial Sheriff as known associate and co-conspirator of Henry McCarty, aka William H. Bonney, aka William H. Antrim, aka Billy the Kid. You will have 60 minutes in which to prove you have what it takes to escape. Use your intellect, powers of observation and logical reasoning skills to make it through the interactive activities and ultimately escape.
